column1: # Consolidated Healthcare Quality and Readmissions Dataset - Synthetic Data Generated by AI for Demonstration Purposes
# for use in healthcare quality analysis
column3: and provider performance evaluation. All data is artificial and AI-generated.

column1: # Dataset Purpose: Hospital Readmissions Reduction Program (HRRP) analysis
# distance_to_hospital: Distance from patient home to hospital (miles)
# systolic_bp: Systolic blood pressure at discharge
# diastolic_bp: Diastolic blood pressure at discharge
# readmission_date: Date of readmission if occurred (YYYY-MM-DD)
# days_to_readmission: Days from discharge to readmission
# observed_readmission_rate: Actual readmission rate for diagnosis
# quality_score_overall: Overall hospital quality rating (1-5 stars)
